name: MusicPlayer
description: Just like any Music Player that plays music with several functionalities such as play,next,prev music; sort,create and delete playlists and displays an album of the corresponding song.

name: Grading System
description: A project embeded with the simplest functions of the SIS System of Ateneo De Davao University allowing the professor to modify the grades of their students.

name: Booking System
description: The project that operates as a simple booking system slightly similar to the concept of the collabhub in Ateneo De Davao University's Miguel Pro Learning Commons .

name: Expense Tracker
description: A financial management project that keeps track of an individual's expenses in different categories, helping them to better assess their financial spendings.
